channel.title: Pop_a_calc on The Arcade
channel.description: Recent content in Pop_a_calc on The Arcade

item.title: Popping a calculator - 32 bit - Part 3/3
item.description: Writing the Shellcode x86 W32 # 32 bit also goes through the same steps as 64 bits so I woudn’t be explaining it in detail rather, I have commented it on the side for you to understand and pick up based on context from x64

item.title: Popping a calculator - 64 bit - Part 2/3
item.description: Writing the Shellcode x64 # This part of the blog covers the 64 bit shellcode to pop a calculator.

item.title: Popping a calculator - Basic - Part 1/3
item.description: Windows Shellcoding Series 1 - Part 1/3 # Popping a calculator # Init() # Now in the series I would be covering both the 64 bit and 32 bit versions of the shellcode to pop a calculator and would go about explaining them both separately.
